description:
Presenting Dodge Hard! An exciting bullet hell shooting game featuring cute pixel art characters!

Dodge Hard is a new shooting game that combines RPG level-up system with bullet hell shooting. Play as a cute Pixel Art Character and find items to save the girl!

Dodge Hard is a new shooting game that combines RPG level-up system with bullet hell shooting. Play as a cute Pixel Art Character and find items to save the girl!

■ Auto Lock-On enables smooth gameplay!
The Auto Lock-On makes sure that the enemy is automatically locked onto, which ensures stress-free gaming.

■ Over 300 types of weapons and equipment!
There is a wide variety of weapons such as rockets, shotguns and smart bullets.
Try out different equipment, such as the dinosaur or nurse mask, among others!
Customize to your heart’s content and head into battle!

■RPG Level-Up system!
Gain EXP and become stronger! 
If you have a hard time beating an enemy, simply level-up, equip stronger gear and try again!

■ DODGE! Avoid enemy attacks!
Avoid enemy bullets by jumping to activate DODGE Mode! While in DODGE Mode you can unleash a powerful attack called “DODGE Attack”!

Press the jump button again while in DODGE mode to counter enemy attacks with “DODGE Barrier”! 

Have fun trying different techniques!

■ Play with your friends in 2P PLAY mode!
In 2P PLAY mode, your friend can join you and operate the support robot.
Join forces and advance together!
name: DODGE HARD
